caption: Figure 3: Progressive validation accuracy of Llama-3-Instruct on MetaMath. Figure 4: Progressive validation accuracy of Phi-3-Medium on MetaMath.
description: The chart displays the progressive validation accuracy of the Flow during online DPO training with and without rollouts for Llama-3-Instruct and Phi-3-Medium models on the MetaMath dataset, comparing it to the zero-shot performance of a single LLM.
